techStack.subtitle: Technologies

process.subtitle: How We Work
process.title: Our
process.description: A proven methodology that ensures successful project delivery from concept to launch and beyond.

discovery.title: Discovery
discovery.description: We start by understanding your vision, goals, and requirements through in-depth discussions.

planning.title: Planning
planning.description: Our team creates a detailed roadmap, architecture design, and project timeline.

development.title: Development
development.description: We build your solution using agile methodology with regular updates and feedback loops.

launch.title: Launch & Support
launch.description: We deploy your project and provide ongoing maintenance and support.

faq.subtitle: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our services and process. Can't find what you're looking for? Contact us directly.

technologies.question: What technologies do you specialize in?
technologies.answer: We specialize in modern web technologies including React, Next.js, Vue.js, Node.js, Python, and Go. For mobile development, we work with React Native and Flutter. We also have expertise in cloud platforms like AWS, GCP, and Azure.

timeline.question: How long does a typical project take?
timeline.answer: Project timelines vary based on scope and complexity. A simple website might take 2-4 weeks, while a complex web application could take 3-6 months. We provide detailed timelines during the planning phase after understanding your requirements.

support.question: Do you provide ongoing support after launch?
support.answer: Yes, we offer comprehensive post-launch support and maintenance packages. This includes bug fixes, security updates, performance monitoring, and feature enhancements. We can tailor a support plan to your specific needs.

process.question: What is your development process?
process.answer: We follow an agile methodology with iterative development cycles. This includes discovery, planning, development sprints, testing, and deployment. You'll have regular check-ins and demos throughout the project to ensure we're aligned with your vision.

team.question: Can you work with our existing team?
team.answer: Absolutely! We frequently integrate with in-house teams as an extension of their capabilities. We can adapt to your workflows, tools, and communication preferences to ensure seamless collaboration.

pricing.question: How do you handle project pricing?
pricing.answer: We offer both fixed-price and time-and-materials pricing models. Fixed-price works well for projects with clearly defined scope, while T&M offers flexibility for evolving requirements. We provide detailed estimates after the discovery phase.

aiPricing.title: AI Integration
aiPricing.description: Transparent pricing for AI solutions. Choose the package that fits your automation needs.
aiPricing.note: * Prices depend on complexity and scope. We offer custom quotes for specific requirements.

process.review: We carefully review every message and get back to you with a thoughtful response.

cookieConsent.title: We use cookies
cookieConsent.message: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience and analyze our traffic.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.metaDescription: Learn how Codezuno collects, uses, and protects your personal information.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: At Codezuno, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or use our services.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.content: We may collect information about you in a variety of ways. The information we may collect includes:

items.name: Personal identification information (name, email address)
items.email: Contact information provided through our contact form
items.message: Project details and requirements you share with us
items.usage: Usage data and analytics (pages visited, time spent on site)

dataUse.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUse.content: We use the information we collect to:

items.respond: Respond to your inquiries and provide customer service
items.marketing: Send you information about our services (with your consent)

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our website and hold certain information. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: Under GDPR and other applicable data protection laws, you have the right to:

items.erasure: Request erasure of your personal data

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.metaDescription: Read the terms and conditions that govern your use of Codezuno services.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using the Codezuno website and services, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and conditions of this agreement. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.

services.title: Description of Services
services.content: Codezuno provides custom software development services, including web development, mobile app development, AI solutions, and related consulting services. The specific deliverables and terms for each project will be outlined in a separate agreement.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property Rights
intellectualProperty.content: Unless otherwise agreed in writing, upon full payment, you will own the intellectual property rights to the custom code developed specifically for your project. We retain rights to our proprietary tools, frameworks, and methodologies used in the development process.

payment.title: Payment Terms
payment.content: Payment terms will be specified in your project agreement. Typically, we require a deposit before work begins, with remaining payments due upon completion of agreed milestones. Late payments may incur additional fees.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Codezuno shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use of our services or any products developed.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: Either party may terminate a project agreement with written notice. You will be responsible for payment of all work completed up to the termination date.

governing.title: Governing Law
governing.content: These terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Poland, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For any questions regarding these Terms of Service, please contact us at

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.metaDescription: Learn about the cookies we use and how to manage them on Codezuno website.

what.title: What Are Cookies
what.content: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and provide information to website owners.

types.title: Types of Cookies We Use
types.intro: We use the following types of cookies on our website:

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.content: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. They enable basic functions like page navigation and access to secure areas of the website.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.content: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously. This helps us improve our website.

preferences.title: Preference Cookies
preferences.content: These cookies allow the website to remember choices you make (such as your preferred language) and provide enhanced, personalized features.

manage.title: Managing Cookies
manage.content: You can control and manage cookies through your browser settings. Please note that removing or blocking cookies may impact your user experience and parts of our website may no longer be fully accessible.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.content: Some cookies are placed by third-party services that appear on our pages. We do not control these third-party cookies. Please refer to the respective privacy policies of these third parties for more information.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about our Cookie Policy, please contact us at
